extern "C" {

void BLOCK-PY-00215_execute() {
    def generate_code(self, request) -> CodeGenerationResult:
        try:
            message = getattr(request, 'message', '').lower()
            complexity = getattr(request, 'complexity', 'medium')
            platform = getattr(request, 'framework', '').lower() or self._detect_platform(message)
            
            patterns = {
                # Container Orchestration
                r'docker.*file|docker.*image|container.*build': self._generate_dockerfile,
                r'docker.*compose|multi.*container': self._generate_docker_compose,
                r'kubernetes|k8s.*deployment': self._generate_k8s_deployment,
                r'helm.*chart|helm.*template': self._generate_helm_chart,
                r'pod.*config|k8s.*pod': self._generate_k8s_pod,
                
                # CI/CD Pipelines
                r'github.*action|github.*workflow': self._generate_github_actions,
                r'gitlab.*ci|gitlab.*pipeline': self._generate_gitlab_ci,
                r'jenkins.*file|jenkins.*pipeline': self._generate_jenkins_pipeline,
                r'azure.*devops|azure.*pipeline': self._generate_azure_pipeline,
                r'ci.*cd.*pipeline|deployment.*pipeline': self._generate_generic_pipeline,
                
                # Infrastructure as Code
                r'terraform|tf.*config': self._generate_terraform,
                r'ansible.*playbook|ansible.*config': self._generate_ansible_playbook,
                r'cloudformation|aws.*template': self._generate_cloudformation,
                r'bicep|azure.*template': self._generate_bicep_template,
                
                # Monitoring & Observability
                r'prometheus|monitoring.*config': self._generate_prometheus_config,
                r'grafana.*dashboard|metrics.*dashboard': self._generate_grafana_dashboard,
                r'elk.*stack|elasticsearch.*config': self._generate_elk_stack,
                r'logging.*config|log.*aggregation': self._generate_logging_config,
                
                # Security & Compliance
                r'security.*scan|vulnerability.*scan': self._generate_security_pipeline,
                r'compliance.*check|policy.*enforcement': self._generate_compliance_config,
                r'secret.*management|credential.*management': self._generate_secret_management,
                
                # Performance & Scaling
                r'load.*balancer|ingress.*controller': self._generate_ingress_config,
                r'auto.*scaling|hpa.*config': self._generate_autoscaling,
                r'performance.*test|load.*test': self._generate_performance_test,
                
                # Backup & Disaster Recovery
                r'backup.*strategy|disaster.*recovery': self._generate_backup_config,
                r'restore.*procedure|recovery.*plan': self._generate_recovery_plan,
                
                # Cloud Native Patterns
                r'microservice.*mesh|service.*mesh': self._generate_service_mesh,
                r'api.*gateway|ingress.*gateway': self._generate_api_gateway,
                r'event.*driven|message.*queue': self._generate_event_system,
            }
            
            for pattern, generator_func in patterns.items():
                if re.search(pattern, message):
                    result = generator_func(request, platform, complexity)
                    result.dependencies = self._extract_dependencies(result.code, platform)
                    return result
            
            return self._generate_default_devops(request, platform, complexity)
            
        except Exception as e:
            return CodeGenerationResult(
                success=False,
                code="",
                language="devops",
                error=f"DevOps generation error: {str(e)}"
            )
}

} // extern "C"
